data.title: CENIT SAP PLM Foundation: Future
data.meta_description: Support your current & future digitization strategy technically & strategically with our software solution CENIT SAP PLM foundation-for SAP速ECC systems & SAP S/4HANA速
data.text:
Quick and easy implementation & transition in our occurrent operation

With the introduction of the CENIT SAP PLM Foundation, preconfigured templates are available that can be implemented quickly and easily. The templates have been developed within the framework of use cases and are based on years of experience from numerous successful customer projects. This means that you as a customer benefit from the in-depth knowledge of our experts, ensuring a smooth transition with a short implementation period in your ongoing operations.

Efficient & flexible organization of engineering processes

With the CENIT SAP PLM Foundation we offer you a scalable and risk reduced overall package that supports you in ensuring an efficient and flexible organization of your engineering processes. The SAP Engineering Control Center (SAP ECTR) is the focus of this product, which enables the integration of your CAD authoring systems, such as CATIA, Siemens NX, SOLIDWORKS速 or EPLAN, into SAP. With the introduction of SAP ECTR, you also lay the technological foundation for a later, simple changeover to SAP S/4HANA速 already in the engineering phase.

The spectrum of SAP ECTR is diverse, because functionally extended and configured for your business processes, the CENIT SAP PLM Foundation offers you support in process optimization, for example by networking collaboration and visualization functions, and in general decision making, through improved data utilization in all areas of the company.

For over 30 years, we have been combining SAP PLM expertise and the experience from numerous customer projects in the CENIT SAP Solutions Team. Through this long-standing expertise in the SAP environment and the use of their software and integration solutions, we offer you as a customer sustainable competence both in the implementation and in consulting for the use of SAP software as well as in operational support for a long-term and sustainable availability of the software solutions used.

Our procedure model

With regard to your specific initial situation and objectives, we integrate the required software components into your SAP system using our best practices - with clearly defined work packages and within a fixed implementation period.

In our role as SAP partner for a successful digital transformation, we support you from strategic planning to the operation of the solution at your company and also stand by your side with our expertise as a service partner for the future mapping of new business processes.
